product_name: Columbia Coolhead Booney Hat with Cape
long_description: Designed for travel in hot climates, the Columbia Coolhead(TM) Booney hat with Cape will keep you cool and comfortable while you trek along sunny trails. Stretchy polyester/elastane exterior with Omni-Freeze(R) Zero technology actually cools when moisture hits the surface to help you stay comfortable on hot days. Nylon headband lining helps wick moisture off your brow to keep you cool and dry. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 3 in. brim shades your face and neck from the sun. Adjust the fit of the hat with the drawcord and toggle in back. Adjustable chin strap secures the Columbia Coolhead Booney hat when the wind picks up.
short_description: Designed for travel in hot climates, the Columbia Coolhead(TM) Booney hat with Cape will keep you cool and comfortable while you trek along sunny trails.
